# Template Documentation

This folder contains **“what to change”** guides for teams cloning this repo as a starting point.

- Prefer `docs/engineering/` for core architecture/patterns that apply across features.
- Prefer `docs/template/` for docs that explain how to customize this template for a product (domains, deep links, flavors, etc.).

## Guides

- Deep linking: `docs/template/deep_linking.md`
- Startup & splash: `docs/template/startup_splash.md`
- Fonts: `docs/template/fonts.md`
